item.title: session 001
item.description: üë• Reference meeting: 001 [!info]+ My goals for this session Start reading relevant bibliography and taking notes Getting more familiar with what concerns the note-taking and notes organization processes, as well as the publication of this diary Readings The following are the readings I am starting off from, in order to get an overview of OpenCitations, bibliometrics and other topics related to Open Science.
